thread.title: Major Hollywood stars join growing opposition to Canada wolf cull
thread.title_full: Major Hollywood stars join growing opposition to Canada wolf cull | News24

author: news24.com
title: Major Hollywood stars join growing opposition to Canada wolf cull
text:
Ottawa - Pop star Miley Cyrus and former Baywatch actress Pamela Anderson added their voice to opposition to a government plan to shoot wolves to reduce their population and save caribou herds in western Canada.
British Columbia said the killings are needed to save herds of caribou whose numbers have plummeted to 1 500 and are now at risk of extinction.
The province's wolf population, which is estimated to top 8 500, is not endangered.
Anderson, who hails from the region, said in an open letter to British Columbia Premier Christy Clark that she is "deeply disturbed that my beloved province is allowing people to hunt and kill wolves."
